bill_title: restrict the sale or rental of certain movies and music to minors.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to restrict the sale or rental of certain movies and music to minors. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. No person may sell or rent any movie or motion picture that has a restricted rating to any person who is less than eighteen years of age unless a parent or guardian of the person attempting to buy or rent the movie or motion picture is present. A violation of this section is a petty offense. Section 2. No person may sell or rent any recorded music or other recorded material such as cassettes and compact discs that has a parental advisory label identifying the music or material as having explicit lyrics or explicit contents to any person who is less than eighteen years of age unless a parent or guardian of the person attempting to buy the recorded music or recorded material is present. A violation of this section is a petty offense. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
